enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Delegates then heard formal statements by high-level representatives from more than 70 Parties, outlining positions and views on climate change negotiations and issues related to the UNFCCC and Kyoto Protocol. <Editor's Note: A complete collection of Plenary statements will soon be available online at: http://COP6.unfccc.int>
